item.description:
*** VOLUNTEERS NEEDED ***
Volunteers:

the day of the event, people are needed

- to hand out invitations and literature

- to hold signs

- to collect signs (they are left outside of Faneuil Hall)

to participate or help - please arrive 30 minutes before the 1:00 PM start.

To help with this: pick up signs/stuff tomorrow morning at the Welcome Center (see tomorrow morning's calendar event for details) between 10:00 and 10:30 AM (at the start of the canvassing activity).

If you want to help but can't make this time/place, call me and I'll arrange to meet you or have you pick up material at my house.

Transportation for a small number of people who volunteer to help at the event is available with Mark Warden.

leave messages at the meetup phone 603 320 9459
or email richyankee@gmail.com
item.name: Boston Tea Party
